Generation V.Black: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
Generation V.White: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
Generation V.Black 2: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.
Generation V.White 2: Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.

Generation VI.X: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
Generation VI.Y: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

Generation VIII.Sword: The two minigears that compose this Pokémon are closer than twins. They mesh well only with each other.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people's invention of the first gears.
